title: Saul Kills the Priests of Nob
summary: David hides in the cave of Adullam and gathers followers. Saul, enraged by Davidâ€™s escape, has Doeg the Edomite kill 85 priests who had unknowingly helped David. Only one, Abiathar, escapes to join David.

faq.question: What happened to the priests of Nob?
faq.answer: Saul ordered them killed for helping David, and Doeg the Edomite carried out the slaughter.

faq.question: Who escaped and joined David?
faq.answer: Abiathar, the son of Ahimelek, one of the priests.
